section.div: Favorites genres: Action, Drama, Comedy, Adventure

div.div:
Follows the life of a hero who manages to win all battles with only one punch. This ability seems to frustrate him as he no longer feels the thrill and adrenaline of fighting a tough battle, which leads to him questioning his past desire of being strong.
The original drawn by ONE.

Eiichiro Maruo is a straight-A student who decides to take up tennis as a side hobby upon entering high school. At the tennis school he runs into Natsuâ€”a bit airheaded, but nobody can beat her in passion for the sport. Soon Eiichiro gets addicted to tennis...and when he applies his academic skills to improving his game, the results will change his life forever!
(Source: K-Manga)

In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a witch. But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and Coco was not born with a gift for magic. Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream to become a witch â€¦ until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious, traveling magician. After secretly seeing Qifrey perform magic in a way sheâ€™s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody â€œknowsâ€ might not be the truth, and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it may seem... (Source: Kodansha USA) Notes: - Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Award in 2018. - Won Best U.S. Edition of International Material - Asia at the Eisner Awards in 2020. - Won the Best Manga Award at the Harvey Awards in 2020.

A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situationâ€¦! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dreamâ€¦!
(Source: MANGA Plus)
<i>Note: - Nominated for the 14thÂ Manga Taisho Award in 2021. - Winner of the 7th Next Manga Award in the Web Manga Category in 2021.<i>

A Bride’s Story tells the tale of a beautiful young bride in nineteenth-century Asia. At the age of twenty, Amir is sent to a neighboring town to be wed. But her surprise at learning her new husband, Karluk, is eight years younger than her is quickly replaced by a deep affection for the boy and his family. Though she hails from just beyond the mountains, Amir’s clan had very different customs, foods, and clothes from what Karluk is used to. As the two of them learn more about each other through their day-to-day lives, the bond of respect and love grows stronger. (Source: Yen Press) Note: Won the Prix IntergÃ©nÃ©rations ("Intergenerational Award") at the AngoulÃªme International Comics Festival in 2012 and the 7th Manga Taishou award in 2014.

Civilization is dead, but Chito and Yuuri are still alive. So they hop aboard their beloved Kettenkrad motorbike and aimlessly wander the ruins of the world they once knew. Day after hopeless day, they look for their next meal and fuel for their ride. But as long as the two are together, even an existence as bleak as theirs has a ray or two of sunshine in it, whether they're sucking down their fill of soup or hunting for machine parts to tinker with. For two girls in a world full of nothing, the experiences and feelings the two share give them something to live forâ€¦ (Source: Yen Press) Note: Winner of the Best Comic Award at the Seiun Awards in 2019.

In an age when the corners of the world have been scoured for their secrets, only one place remains unexploredâ€“a massive cave system known as the Abyss. Those who traverse its endless pits and labyrinth-like tunnels are known as Cave Raiders. A young orphan named Riko dreams of following in her motherâ€™s footsteps as a Cave Raider, and when she meets a strange robot when exploring the Abyss, sheâ€™s one step closer to achieving her goal! (Source: Seven Seas Entertainment) Notes: - Includes the 4-chapter "How Are You? Somewhere" side story. - Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards (2018).
A prequel series that reveals Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.

In this new action-comedy, everything about a young man named Saitama screams "AVERAGE,” from his lifeless expression, to his bald head, to his unimpressive physique. However, this average-looking fellow doesn't have your average problem... He's actually a superhero that's looking for tough opponents! The problem is, every time he finds a promising candidate he beats the snot out of them in one punch. Can Saitama finally find an evil villain strong enough to challenge him? Follow Saitama through his hilarious romps as he searches for new bad guys to challenge!
(Source: Viz Media)
